name: Flying Potato Circus
description:
Two polar opposite potatoes form a high flying trapeze which you control. Impress the crowd with beautiful poses as you become a great trapeze artist.

Instructions

Good Potato      Bad Potato

J  = Jump/ Catch             A = Jump/ Catch

L = Speed Up                   D = Speed Up

I = Pose 1                          W = Pose 1

K = Pose2                         S = Pose 2

Accumulate points

Don't fall or you will smash!
